title: Modern Residence with Rooftop Deck
posting_body: ['Modern Residence with Rooftop Deck', 'Listing ID #: 212974', 'Price: $3,100', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 1.0', 'Bathrooms: 1.0', 'Pets: Pets OK', 'Building Amenities', 'Bicycle Room', 'Common Outdoor Space', 'Elevator', 'Garage', 'Health Club', 'Laundry', 'New Construction', 'Receiving Room', 'Roof Deck', 'Storage', 'Subway', 'Virtual Doorman', 'Apartment Amenities', 'Dishwasher', 'Hardwood', 'Open View', 'The Penelope is a new development located just a off Astoria Blvd including a fitness center, roof deck, and laundry.', 'The apartment includes hardwood flooring throughout, semi floor to ceiling windows that bring in a ton of natural light.', 'Modern kitchen with massive cedar stone island, and a full set of stainless steel appliances.', 'Subway tiled bathroom with a deep soaking tub.', "Located just 2 blocks away from Astoria Blvd subway station and down the block where you'll find plenty of trending restaurants, coffee shops, grocery stores and much more.", 'Contact Sofia at <URL> to schedule your tour today!', 'Sofia Aguirre', 'Phone: (718) 685-2775', 'Mobile: (718) 424-0813', 'Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group \xa0 (718) 685-2775 \xa0 (718) 424-0813 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Sofia Aguirre at (718) 424-0813']
